title: Mr. December
description: From international bestselling author Nicole S. Goodin, comes a new standalone, stepbrother romance.Lukah Andrews.Sexy stripper.Hater of his father.… And trouble with a capital ‘T’.Margot Lowell.No nonsense kind of girl.Sassy mouthed.… And his new stepsister.A drunk, half-naked Santa isn’t quite what Margot expected when she imagined meeting her brand-new stepbrother, but if there’s one thing Lukah knows how to do, it’s put on a show.Their mutual attraction is instant, undeniable and most importantly, forbidden, yet breaking the rules has never felt this good.Lukah wants a repeat performance.Margot isn’t buying what he’s selling.With nowhere to hide, and sparks flying between them, will Lukah convince Margot to give in to temptation and admit that once was never going to be enough?
author: Nicole S. Goodin
